Literature.Title: Isolation of Antimicrobial Genes from Oryza rufipogon Griff by Using a Bacillus subtilis Expression System with Potential Antimicrobial Activities.
Literature.Author: Li J, Islam S, Guo P, Hu X, Dong W

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Clavibacter fangii(MIC=10.7µM),Clavibacter michiganensis subsp. michiganensis(MIC=10.5µM),Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzae(MIC=10.1µM),Ralstonia solanacearum(MIC=8.1µM),Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzicola(MIC=7.7µM),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=8.3µM)
